TopicTitle: Help with mechjeb ascent auto pilot

Articles.Content: I recently installed mechjeb to launch fuel to my space station, it worked the first time, but any time after my ship would crash, and it was the same ship! Any suggestions?
Which version of mechjeb are you using? I had the same problem, but i realized thaht i have changed some values in the Attitude control window, reverting to the original values solve the problem
Also, shouldn't this be asked in the mechjeb mod thread?
